atk-s0513a2:2733_6: Mayhañca assūti mayhaṃ pana satta māsakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2733_8: Tena hi macchena saddhiṃ aññepi macchā ekato baddhā taṃ sakalampi macchuddānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

atk-s0513a2:2737_0: Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ sarantiyā, kataṃ apacitiṃ tayā”ti.

atk-s0513a2:2739_0: Idaṃ vatvā ca pana sā devatā tassa kaniṭṭhena katakūṭakammaṃ sabbaṃ kathetvā “eso idāni hadayena sussantena nipanno,

atk-s0513a2:2741_0: “Paduṭṭhacittassa na phāti hoti, na cāpi taṃ devatā pūjayanti;
atk-s0513a2:2742_0: Yo bhātaraṃ pettikaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, avañcayī dukkaṭakammakārī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2743_0: Tattha na phāti hotīti evarūpassa puggalassa idhaloke vā paraloke vā vuḍḍhi nāma na hoti.
atk-s0513a2:2743_1: Na cāpi tanti taṃ puggalaṃ tassa santakaṃ rakkhamānā devatā na pūjayanti.
atk-s0513a2:2744_0: Iti devatā mittadubbhicorassa kahāpaṇe adātukāmā evamāha.
atk-s0513a2:2744_1: Bodhisatto pana “na sakkā evaṃ kātu”nti tassapi pañca kahāpaṇasatāni pesesiyeva.

atk-s0513a2:2750_0: Atīte pana bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā

atk-s0513a2:2750_2: Tassa ṭhānato apanīto pitu purohito atthi.
atk-s0513a2:2750_3: So duggato hutvā ekasmiṃ jaragehe vasati.
atk-s0513a2:2750_4: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto aññātakavesena rattibhāge nagaraṃ pariggaṇhanto vicarati.
atk-s0513a2:2750_5: Tamenaṃ katakammacorā ekasmiṃ surāpāne suraṃ pivitvā aparampi ghaṭenādāya attano gehaṃ gacchantā antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2750_6: disvā “are kosi tva”nti vatvā paharitvā uttarisāṭakaṃ gahetvā ghaṭaṃ ukkhipāpetvā tāsentā gacchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2750_7: Sopi kho brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ khaṇe nikkhamitvā antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhito nakkhattaṃ olokento rañño amittānaṃ hatthagatabhāvaṃ ñatvā brāhmaṇiṃ āmantesi. Sā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2750_8: ayyā”ti vatvā vegena tassa santikaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0513a2:2751_0: Rājā brāhmaṇassa saddaṃ sutvā thokaṃ gantvā dhutte āha –
atk-s0513a2:2751_7: Rājā tampi sutvā tampi gehaṃ sallakkhetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a2:2751_8: So vibhātāya rattiyā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ ācariyā rattiṃ nakkhattaṃ olokayitthā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2751_12: Rājā “asukagehato brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosathā”ti porāṇakapurohitaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ, ācariya,

atk-s0513a2:2751_15: ajja rattiṃ tumhe amittavasaṃ gantvā muhutteneva muttā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2751_16: Rājā “nakkhattajānanakena nāma evarūpena bhavitabba”nti sesabrāhmaṇe nikkaḍḍhāpetvā “brāhmaṇa,

atk-s0513a2:2755_0: Ahaṃ gāmavaraṃ icche, brāhmaṇī ca gavaṃ sataṃ.

atk-s0513a2:2766_0: Iti rājā brāhmaṇena patthitañca aññañca mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā “ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ kattabbakiccesu ussukkaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2766_1: āpajjā”ti vatvā brāhmaṇaṃ attano santike akāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2767_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2771_0: Sīlaṃ kireva kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sīlavīmaṃsakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2771_1: Vatthu pana paccuppannampi atītampi heṭṭhā ekakanipāte sīlavīmaṃsakajātake vitthāritameva.
atk-s0513a2:2771_2: Idha pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa purohito sīlasampanno “attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2771_3: heraññikaphalakato dve divase ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a2:2771_4: Atha naṃ tatiyadivase “coro”ti gahetvā rañño santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2771_5: So antarāmagge ahituṇḍike sappaṃ kīḷāpente addasa.
atk-s0513a2:2771_6: Atha naṃ rājā disvā “kasmā evarūpaṃ akāsī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a2:2771_7: Brāhmaṇo “attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmatāyā”ti vatvā imā gāthā avoca –

atk-s0513a2:2781_8: Anumataṃ sivanti “khemaṃ nibbhaya”nti evaṃ paṇḍitehi sampaṭicchitaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2781_9: Yena vuccatīti yena sīlena sīlavā puriso ariyānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ paṭipattiṃ samācaranto “ariyavuttisamācāro”ti vuccati,
atk-s0513a2:2782_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto tīhi gāthāhi sīlassa vaṇṇaṃ pakāsento rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,

atk-s0513a2:2783_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2788_0: Anusāsaniyopi ca macchavaro, maṇikuṇḍalakena kirena dasāti.
atk-s0513a2:2792_0: Sabbakāmadadaṃ kumbhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa bhāgineyyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2792_1: So kira mātāpitūnaṃ santakā cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo pānabyasanena nāsetvā seṭṭhino santikaṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0513a2:2793_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhi.

atk-s0513a2:2797_0: Yāva naṃ anupāleti, tāva so sukhamedhati.
atk-s0513a2:2799_0: “Yadā matto ca ditto ca, pamādā kumbhamabbhidā;
atk-s0513a2:2800_0: Tadā naggo ca pottho ca, pacchā bālo vihaññati.

atk-s0513a2:2824_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ tāva manussabhūtānaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā amhākaṃ suhajje kātuṃ na sakkoma,

atk-s0513a2:2824_2: ayaṃ kāko samāno attano rañño jīvitaṃ pariccajati,
atk-s0513a2:2824_3: ativiya sappuriso madhurassaro dhammakathiko”ti guṇesu pasīditvā taṃ setacchattena pūjesi.
atk-s0513a2:2824_4: So attanā laddhena setacchattena rājānameva pūjetvā bodhisattassa guṇe kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2824_5: Rājā naṃ pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ sutvā ubhinnampi tesaṃ attano bhojananiyāmena bhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a2:2824_7: sayañca bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā pañca sīlāni rakkhi.
atk-s0513a2:2825_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2829_0: Phuṭṭhassa meti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2829_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko puriso paṇḍurogena aṭṭito vejjehi paṭikkhitto.
atk-s0513a2:2829_6: So katipāheneva kiñci sappāyaṃ labhitvā arogo hutvā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a2:2829_7: So satthu santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a2:2829_9: asuko nāma paṇḍurogī ‘imamhā rogā vuṭṭhito pabbajissāmī’ti cintetvā pabbajito ceva arahattañca patto”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2829_16: pubbe paṇḍitāpi evaṃ vatvā rogā vuṭṭhāya pabbajitvā attano vuḍḍhimakaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2830_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto paṇḍurogī ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:2830_3: So “imamhā rogā vuṭṭhito pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā kiñcideva sappāyaṃ labhitvā arogo hutvā himavantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2830_4: pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā jhānasukhena viharanto “ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2830_5: kālaṃ evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāma nālattha”nti udānaṃ udānento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a2:2832_0: “Phuṭṭhassa me aññatarena byādhinā, rogena bāḷhaṃ dukhitassa ruppato;
atk-s0513a2:2833_0: Parisussati khippamidaṃ kaḷevaraṃ, pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2839_0: Yatthappamattā adhimucchitā pajā, hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2840_0: Tattha aññatarenāti aṭṭhanavutiyā rogesu ekena paṇḍurogabyādhinā.
atk-s0513a2:2840_3: Paṃsuni ātape katanti yathā ātape tattavālikāya ṭhapitaṃ sukhumapupphaṃ parisusseyya,
atk-s0513a2:2841_0: Ajaññaṃ jaññasaṅkhātanti paṭikūlaṃ amanāpameva bālānaṃ manāpanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2841_2: Jaññarūpaṃ apassatoti apassantassa andhabālaputhujjanassa manāpaṃ sādhurūpaṃ paribhogasabhāvaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0513a2:2841_3: “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā nayena pakāsito asubhasabhāvo bālānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0513a2:2842_3: Hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyāti imasmiṃ pūtikāye laggā laggitā hutvā apāyamaggaṃ pūrentā devamanussabhedāya sugatiupapattiyā maggaṃ parihāpenti.
atk-s0513a2:2843_0: Iti mahāsatto nānappakārena asucibhāvañca niccāturabhāvañca pariggaṇhanto kāye nibbinditvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2844_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a2:2848_0: Koyaṃ bindussaro vaggūti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattakokālike ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2848_1: Tadā hi devadatte parihīnalābhasakkāre kokāliko kulāni upasaṅkamitvā “devadattatthero nāma mahāsammatapaveṇiyā
atk-s0513a2:2848_2: okkākarājavaṃse jāto asambhinnakhattiyavaṃse vaḍḍhito tipiṭakadharo jhānalābhī madhurakatho dhammakathiko,
atk-s0513a2:2848_3: detha karotha therassā”ti devadattassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0513a2:2848_4: Devadattopi “kokāliko udiccabrāhmaṇakulā nikkhamitvā pabbajito bahussuto dhammakathiko,
atk-s0513a2:2848_5: detha karotha kokālikassā”ti kokālikassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0513a2:2848_6: Iti te aññamaññassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā kulagharesu bhuñjantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a2:2848_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a2:2848_14: idāneva te aññamaññassa abhūtaguṇakathaṃ kathetvā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a2:2849_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ jambuvanasaṇḍe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:2849_1: Tatreko kāko jambusākhāya nisinno jambupakkāni khādati.
atk-s0513a2:2849_2: Atheko siṅgālo āgantvā uddhaṃ olokento kākaṃ disvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imassa abhūtaguṇakathaṃ kathetvā jambūni
atk-s0513a2:2849_3: khādeyya”nti tassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2853_0: Tattha bindussaroti bindunā avisārena piṇḍitena sarena samannāgato.
atk-s0513a2:2853_3: Moracchāpova kūjatīti taruṇamorova manāpena saddena “ko nāmeso kūjatī”ti vadati.
atk-s0513a2:2854_0: Atha naṃ kāko paṭipasaṃsanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2858_0: Tattha byagghacchāpasarīvaṇṇāti tvaṃ amhākaṃ byagghapotakasamānavaṇṇova khāyasi,
atk-s0513a2:2858_1: tena taṃ vadāmi ambho byagghacchāpasarīvaṇṇa. Bhuñja, samma,
atk-s0513a2:2858_2: dadāmi teti vayassa yāvadatthaṃ jambupakkāni khāda,
atk-s0513a2:2859_0: Evañca pana vatvā jambusākhaṃ cāletvā phalāni pātesi.
atk-s0513a2:2859_1: Atha tasmiṃ jamburukkhe adhivatthā devatā te ubhopi abhūtaguṇakathaṃ kathetvā jambūni khādante disvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2863_0: Tattha vantādanti paresaṃ vantabhattakhādakaṃ kākaṃ. Kuṇapādañcāti kuṇapakhādakaṃ siṅgālañca.
atk-s0513a2:2864_0: Imañca pana gāthaṃ vatvā sā devatā bheravarūpārammaṇaṃ dassetvā te tato palāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:2865_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2869_0: Usabhasseva te khandhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto teyeva dve jane ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2870_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmūpacāre eraṇḍarukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:2870_1: Tadā ekasmiṃ gāmake mataṃ jaraggavaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā gāmadvāre eraṇḍavane chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2870_2: Eko siṅgālo āgantvā tassa maṃsaṃ khādi.
atk-s0513a2:2870_3: Eko kāko āgantvā eraṇḍe nilīno taṃ disvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ etassa abhūtaguṇakathaṃ kathetvā maṃsaṃ khādeyya”nti cintetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2873_0: Migarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2874_0: Tattha namo tyatthūti namo te atthu.
atk-s0513a2:2879_0: Tattha ito pariyāhīti eraṇḍato otaritvā ito yenāhaṃ, tenāgantvā maṃsaṃ khādāti vadati.
atk-s0513a2:2880_0: Taṃ tesaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā rukkhadevatā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2883_0: Eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2885_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2889_0: Ko nāyanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto upanandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2889_3: Vassūpanāyikakāle dvīsu tīsu vihāresu vassaṃ upagantvā ekasmiṃ upāhane ṭhapeti,
atk-s0513a2:2889_7: janapadavihāraṃ gantvā paṇītaparikkhāre bhikkhū disvā ariyavaṃsakathaṃ kathetvā tesaṃ paṃsukūlāni gāhāpetvā tesaṃ cīvarāni gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a2:2889_8: mattikāpatte gāhāpetvā manāpamanāpe patte thālakāni ca gahetvā yānakaṃ pūretvā jetavanaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0513a2:2889_10: upanando sakyaputto mahagghaso mahiccho aññesaṃ paṭipattiṃ kathetvā samaṇaparikkhārena yānakaṃ pūretvā āgacchatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2889_13: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2889_16: paṭhamatarañhi attanā appicchena hutvā pacchā paresaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2892_0: Imaṃ dhammapade gāthaṃ desetvā upanandaṃ garahitvā “na,
atk-s0513a2:2892_3: pubbe mahāsamuddepi udakaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ maññī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2893_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto samuddadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:2893_1: Atheko kāko samuddassa uparibhāge vicaranto “samudde udakaṃ pamāṇena pivatha,
atk-s0513a2:2893_2: rakkhantā pivathā”ti macchasaṅghasakuṇasaṅghe vārento vārento carati.
atk-s0513a2:2896_0: Macche makare ca vāreti, ūmīsu ca vihaññatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2897_0: Tattha ko nāyanti ko nu ayaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2902_2: tenamhi anantapāyī nāma sakuṇo mahatiyāpi apūraṇiyā taṇhāya samannāgatattā atittotipi ahaṃ disāsu suto vissuto pākaṭo,
atk-s0513a2:2902_3: svāhaṃ imaṃ sakalasamuddaṃ sundarānaṃ ratanānaṃ ākarattā sāgarena vā khatattā sāgaraṃ saritānaṃ patibhāvena saritaṃpatiṃ pātumicchāmīti.
atk-s0513a2:2905_0: “So ayaṃ hāyati ceva, pūrate ca mahodadhi;
atk-s0513a2:2906_0: Nāssa nāyati pītanto, apeyyo kira sāgaro”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2907_0: Tattha so ayaṃ hāyati cevāti udakassa osakkanavelāya hāyati,
atk-s0513a2:2907_2: Nāssa nāyatīti assa mahāsamuddassa sacepi naṃ sakalaloko piveyya,
atk-s0513a2:2907_3: tathāpi “ito ettakaṃ nāma udakaṃ pīta”nti pariyanto na paññāyati.
atk-s0513a2:2907_4: Apeyyo kirāti eso kira sāgaro na sakkā kenaci udakaṃ khepetvā pātunti.
atk-s0513a2:2908_0: Evañca pana vatvā sā bheravarūpārammaṇaṃ dassetvā samuddakākaṃ palāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:2909_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2913_0: Ucce sakuṇa ḍemānāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2913_3: Taṃ pana purisaṃ jīvantaṃ sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2913_4: So tattha nisinno ākāsena gacchantaṃ ekaṃ kākaṃ disvā tāvakharampi taṃ vedanaṃ agaṇetvā piyabhariyāya sāsanaṃ pesetuṃ kākaṃ āmantento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a2:2916_0: Vajjāsi kho tvaṃ vāmūruṃ, ciraṃ kho sā karissati.
atk-s0513a2:2918_0: “Idaṃ kho sā na jānāti, asiṃ sattiñca oḍḍitaṃ;
atk-s0513a2:2919_0: Sā caṇḍī kāhati kodhaṃ, taṃ me tapati no idaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2922_0: Kāsikañca muduṃ vatthaṃ, tappetu dhanikā piyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2923_3: So hi pattehi yānaṃ katvā gamanato pattayāno,
atk-s0513a2:2923_8: Ciraṃ kho sā karissatīti sā imaṃ pavattiṃ ajānamānā mama āgamanaṃ ciraṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a2:2923_9: “ciraṃ me gatassa piyassa na ca āgacchatī”ti evaṃ cintessatīti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2924_0: Asiṃ sattiñcāti asisamānatāya sattisamānatāya ca sūlameva sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0513a2:2924_4: Taṃ me tapatīti taṃ tassā kujjhanaṃ maṃ tapati.
atk-s0513a2:2924_5: No idanti idha pana idaṃ sūlaṃ maṃ na tapatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a2:2925_0: “Esa uppalasannāho”tiādīhi ghare ussīsake ṭhapitaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0513a2:2925_1: Tattha uppalasannāhoti uppalo ca sannāho ca uppalasannāho,
atk-s0513a2:2925_2: uppalasadiso kaṇayo ca sannāhako cāti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2925_4: Kāsikañca mudu vatthanti muduṃ kāsikasāṭakayugaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0513a2:2925_6: Tappetu dhanikā piyāti etaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā sā mama piyā dhanatthikā iminā dhanena tappetu pūretu,
atk-s0513a2:2926_0: Evaṃ so paridevamānova kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:2927_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a2:2927_4: yena pana devaputtena taṃ kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2931_0: Udumbarā cime pakkāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2931_1: So kira aññatarasmiṃ paccantagāmake vihāraṃ kāretvā vasati.
atk-s0513a2:2931_6: Atheko bhikkhu cārikaṃ caramāno taṃ vihāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a2:2931_7: Nevāsiko tassa āgantukavattaṃ katvā punadivase taṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0513a2:2931_8: Manussā paṇītaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā svātanāya nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2931_10: “ekenupāyena imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vañcetvā nikkaḍḍhitvā imaṃ vihāraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2931_11: Atha naṃ therūpaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0513a2:2931_17: bhante”ti nevāsiko “yāva mamāgamanā there mā pamajjitthā”ti manussānaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a2:2932_0: Tato paṭṭhāya āgantuko “tassa nevāsikassa ayañca ayañca doso”ti te manusse paribhindi.
atk-s0513a2:2932_3: So ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasitvā punadivase piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0513a2:2932_5: So vippaṭisārī hutvā puna jetavanaṃ gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a2:2932_7: asuko kira bhikkhu asukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vihārā nikkaḍḍhitvā sayaṃ tattha vasī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2932_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a2:2932_12: pubbepi so imaṃ vasanaṭṭhānā nikkaḍḍhiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2933_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:2933_2: Atheko rattamukhakhuddakamakkaṭo ekissā anovassikāya pāsāṇadariyā vasamāno ekadivasaṃ daridvāre atemanaṭṭhāne sukhena nisīdi.
atk-s0513a2:2933_3: Tattha eko kāḷamukhamahāmakkaṭo tinto sītena pīḷiyamāno vicaranto taṃ tathānisinnaṃ disvā “upāyena naṃ
atk-s0513a2:2933_4: nīharitvā ettha vasissāmī”ti cintetvā kucchiṃ olambetvā suhitākāraṃ dassetvā tassa purato ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2936_0: Ehi nikkhama bhuñjassu, kiṃ jighacchāya miyyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2938_0: Sopi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā saddahitvā phalāni khāditukāmo nikkhamitvā tattha tattha vicaritvā kiñci alabhanto
atk-s0513a2:2938_1: punāgantvā taṃ antopāsāṇadariyaṃ pavisitvā nisinnaṃ disvā “vañcessāmi na”nti tassa purato ṭhatvā dutiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2942_0: Tattha dumapakkāni māsitoti udumbarādīni rukkhaphalāni khāditvā asito dhāto suhito.
atk-s0513a2:2946_0: Daharo kapi saddheyya, na hi jiṇṇo jarākapī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2947_1: yaṃ vane jāto kapi vane jātassa kapino vañcanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0513a2:2947_2: taṃ tayā sadiso daharo vānaro saddaheyya,
atk-s0513a2:2947_3: mādiso pana jiṇṇo jarākapi mahallakamakkaṭo na hi saddaheyya,
atk-s0513a2:2947_5: Imasmiñhi himavantapadese sabbaṃ phalāphalaṃ vassena kilinnaṃ patitaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2947_6: puna tava idaṃ ṭhānaṃ natthi, gacchāti.
atk-s0513a2:2948_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2952_0: Pure tuvanti idaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto keḷisīle bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2952_1: Te kira bhikkhū satthari uparipāsāde viharante heṭṭhāpāsāde diṭṭhasutādīni kathentā kalahañca paribhāsañca karontā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2952_2: Satthā mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantetvā “ete bhikkhū saṃvejehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a2:2952_3: Thero ākāse uppatitvā pādaṅguṭṭhakena pāsādathupikaṃ paharitvā yāva udakapariyantā pāsādaṃ kampesi.
atk-s0513a2:2952_4: Te bhikkhū maraṇabhayabhītā nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhaṃsū.
atk-s0513a2:2952_5: Tesaṃ so keḷisīlabhāvo bhikkhūsu pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a2:2952_7: ekacce bhikkhū evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā keḷisīlā hutvā vicaranti,
atk-s0513a2:2952_8: ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti vipassanāya kammaṃ na karontī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2952_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a2:2953_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a2:2953_2: So aparabhāge nikkhamitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapadese vasi.
atk-s0513a2:2953_3: Athaññe keḷisīlā tāpasā himavantapadese assamaṃ māpetvā vasiṃsu,
atk-s0513a2:2953_5: araññato phalāphalāni āharitvā khāditvā hasamānā nānappakārāya keḷiyā vītināmenti.
atk-s0513a2:2953_7: sopi keḷisīlakova mukhavikārādīni karonto tāpasānaṃ nānāvidhaṃ keḷiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a2:2953_8: Tāpasā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2953_9: Tesaṃ gatakālato paṭṭhāya bodhisatto taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0513a2:2953_10: makkaṭo tesaṃ viya tassapi keḷiṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a2:2954_0: Bodhisatto accharaṃ paharitvā “susikkhitapabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma ācārasampannena kāyādīhi
atk-s0513a2:2954_1: susaññatena jhānesu yuttena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tassa ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2954_2: So tato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ācārasampanno ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:2954_4: Atha te tāpasā loṇambilaṃ sevitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2954_5: Makkaṭo pubbe viya tesaṃ keḷiṃ na dassesi.
atk-s0513a2:2956_0: “Pure tuvaṃ sīlavataṃ sakāse, okkantikaṃ kīḷasi assamamhi;
atk-s0513a2:2957_0: Karohare makkaṭiyāni makkaṭa, na taṃ mayaṃ sīlavataṃ ramāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2958_0: Tattha sīlavataṃ sakāseti keḷisīlānaṃ amhākaṃ santike.
atk-s0513a2:2958_4: Na taṃ mayaṃ sīlavataṃ ramāmāti yaṃ pubbe tava keḷisīlaṃ keḷivataṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2961_0: “Sutā hi mayhaṃ paramā visuddhi, komāraputtassa bahussutassa;
atk-s0513a2:2962_0: Mā dāni maṃ maññi tuvaṃ yathā pure, jhānānuyutto viharāmi āvuso”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2963_2: Bahussutassāti bahūnaṃ kasiṇaparikammānaṃ aṭṭhannañca samāpattīnaṃ sutattā ceva paṭividdhattā ca bahussutassa.
atk-s0513a2:2963_3: Tuvanti tesu ekaṃ tāpasaṃ ālapanto idāni mā maṃ tvaṃ pure viya sañjāni,
atk-s0513a2:2966_0: “Sacepi selasmi vapeyya bījaṃ, devo ca vasse na hi taṃ virūḷhe;
atk-s0513a2:2967_0: Sutā hi te sā paramā visuddhi, ārā tuvaṃ makkaṭa jhānabhūmiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2968_5: tvaṃ pana tiracchānayonikattā ārā jhānabhūmiyā dūre ṭhito,
atk-s0513a2:2968_6: na sakkā tayā jhānaṃ nibbattetunti makkaṭaṃ garahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2969_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:2973_0: Parapāṇarodhā jīvantoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇasanthataṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2973_3: āyasmā upaseno duvassiko ekavassikena saddhivihārikena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthārā garahito
atk-s0513a2:2973_4: vanditvā pakkanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattappatto appicchatādiguṇayutto terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya
atk-s0513a2:2973_5: parisampi terasadhutaṅgadharaṃ katvā bhagavati temāsaṃ paṭisallīne sapariso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parisaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2973_6: nissāya paṭhamaṃ garahaṃ labhitvā adhammikāya katikāya ananuvattane dutiyaṃ sādhukāraṃ labhitvā “ito
atk-s0513a2:2973_7: paṭṭhāya dhutaṅgadharā bhikkhū yathāsukhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā maṃ passantū”ti satthārā katānuggaho nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a2:2973_9: Tato pabhuti bhikkhū dhutaṅgadharā hutvā satthāraṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitvā satthari paṭisallānā vuṭṭhite
atk-s0513a2:2973_10: tattha tattha paṃsukūlāni chaḍḍetvā attano pattacīvarāneva gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2973_11: Satthā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ senāsanacārikaṃ caranto tattha tattha patitāni paṃsukūlāni disvā pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:2973_12: imesaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ vakassa uposathakammasadisaṃ ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2974_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakko devarājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:2974_2: atha gaṅgāya mahodakaṃ āgantvā taṃ pāsāṇaṃ parikkhipi.
atk-s0513a2:2974_10: nikkammassa pana nipajjanato uposathakammaṃ vara”nti manasāva uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sīlāni samādiyitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a2:2974_11: Tadā sakko devarājā āvajjamāno tassa taṃ dubbalasamādānaṃ ñatvā “etaṃ vakaṃ viheṭhessāmī”ti eḷakarūpena āgantvā tassa avidūre ṭhatvā attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a2:2974_12: Vako taṃ disvā “aññasmiṃ divase uposathakammaṃ jānissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya taṃ gaṇhituṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a2:2974_13: Eḷakopi ito cito ca pakkhanditvā attānaṃ gahetuṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2974_14: Vako taṃ gahetuṃ asakkonto nivattitvā āgamma “uposathakammaṃ tāva me na bhijjatī”ti tattheva puna nipajji.
atk-s0513a2:2974_15: Sakko sakkattabhāveneva ākāse ṭhatvā “tādisassa dubbalajjhāsayassa kiṃ uposathakammena,
atk-s0513a2:2974_16: tvaṃ mama sakkabhāvaṃ ajānanto eḷakamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo ahosī”ti taṃ viheṭhetvā garahitvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a2:2986_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sakko ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2990_0: Varakumbha supatta sirivhayano, sucisammata bindusaro cusabho;
atk-s0513a2:2991_0: Saritaṃpati caṇḍi jarākapinā, atha makkaṭiyā vakakena dasāti.
